item.description:
DINNER + FIREWORKS

DATE: Sunday, July 4th

TIME: 6 PM to 11 PM

Come join us for an evening of dinner, followed by a dazzling display of fireworks. We will start the evening off at The Similans in Cambridge. This is a Thai restaurant that has been selected as one of the best Thai restaurants in Boston by "Zagat Survey" and "Boston Magazine". Afterwards, we will walk to "Memorial Drive" and "Massachusetts Avenue" to watch the fireworks on the Charles River.

http://www.yelp.com/b...
http://www.zagat.com/...
http://www.thesimilan...

We hope you can make it.

Parking is FREE on Sunday. There are plenty of meters for you to park, but if you really cannot find a spot, then you can park at the CambridgeSide Galleria Mall for $3, and walk 1 block. You can also take the train to Lechmere Station (Green Line), or Kendall Square (Red Line), and walk a few blocks to the restaurant.

Some items which you can bring include:
  • large mat
  • foldable chair
  • camera or video recorder
  • snacks
  • bottled water or drinks
  • comfortable walking shoes


    CONTACT:
    The reservation at "The Similans" will be under "Tim". If you have any questions, please contact Tim Wong at (781) 816-9064 via phone or SMS.

    P.S. Please display a Meetup photo so that I can recognize you upon arrival. Thanks!
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for the reservations under Tim.

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Dinner & Fireworks
